title.rendered: PRIVATE SAFETY DEPOSIT BOX FOR GOLD STORAGE IN Manhattan

content.rendered:
Home

PRIVATE SAFETY DEPOSIT BOX
FOR GOLD STORAGE IN Manhattan

Your valuables deserve the utmost security. At Integrated Vaults, we understand the importance of protecting your precious metals and other assets. That’s why we offer a range of secure deposit box solutions to provide unparalleled peace of mind.
Book a Tour

Unmatched Security for Your Private Safety Deposit Box

At Integrated Vaults stands out from the competition with our state-of-the-art, high-security Manhattan facility. Our deposit boxes are housed within a fortress-like structure, featuring advanced security measures, including 24/7 surveillance, biometric access control, and an unwavering commitment to discretion.

 

SECURE A SAFETY DEPOSIT BOX

SAFETY DEPOSIT BOXES FOR PRECIOUS METALS STORAGE

At Integrated Vaults offers a variety of safety deposit boxes specifically tailored to meet the needs of gold bullion investors. Our boxes are constructed from high-strength steel and are equipped with advanced security features, including:

  • Multi-layered access control: Dual key access system and a state-of-the-art alarm system for complete security.
  • Varying Sizes: Choose from various sizes to accommodate your specific storage requirements, from small boxes ideal for a few coins to large boxes holding significant quantities of gold storage box.

BENEFITS

  • Privacy: Rest assured that your gold bullion holdings and other valuables remain completely confidential.
  • Security: Our robust security measures deter theft and ensure the safety of your valuables.
  • Convenience: With various sizes, At Integrated Vaults offers a secure and convenient solution for storing your gold bullion and other valuables.

SECURED ACCESS At Integrated Vaults

At Integrated Vaults, security is our top priority. We employ a comprehensive security system that includes:
  • High-security facility: Our vault has reinforced walls, restricted access points, and advanced surveillance technology.
  • Advanced alarm systems: Our facility is equipped with sophisticated alarm systems monitored 24/7 by security professionals.
  • Rigorous access control: Only authorised personnel access the vault; all access is strictly monitored and logged.
SECURE A SAFETY DEPOSIT BOX

WHY CHOOSE At Integrated Vaults?

SUPERIOR CUSTOMER SERVICE

 

Our professional staff is dedicated to providing you with exceptional service and support.

NO ACCESS FEES

Pay only for your safety deposit box size.

NO HIDDEN FEES

We offer complete transparency in our pricing.

STATE-OF-THE-ART SECURITY TECHNOLOGY

 

We utilise the latest security advancements to protect your valuables.

FLEXIBLE ACCESS OPTIONS

 

Choose the access plan that best suits your needs through convenient scheduling.

PRIVATE VIEWING ROOMS

 

Discreetly review your belongings in a dedicated, secure space.

WHY CHOOSE At Integrated Vaults?

SUPERIOR CUSTOMER SERVICE

Our professional team is committed to providing great service and support to make your experience a seamless one.

STATE-OF-THE-ART SECURITY TECHNOLOGY

We utilise the latest security advancements to ensure the complete safety of your valuables.

FLEXIBLE ACCESS OPTIONS

 

Choose the access plan that best suits your needs through convenient scheduling.

We also offer our secure storage service for jewellery, documents, coins and banknotes, and other valuables.

SAFETY DEPOSIT BOX MADE EASY

Booking an appointment to access your safety deposit box At Integrated Vaults is a simple process:

  1. Find At Integrated Vaults: Our location is deliberately chosen to be easily accessible.
  2. Select a storage size: We have four box sizes available, so you can choose the one that suits your needs. Browse our selection of safety deposit box sizes online or visit us in person to discuss the requirements with a member of our friendly team.
  3. Automate your payments: We offer a convenient auto-pay system to avoid late fees and ensure uninterrupted access to your valuables.

OTHER SOLUTIONS OFFERED

At Integrated Vaults cater to a wide range of valuables

Jewellery

 

Keeping your precious jewellery safe in United States is a constant concern. Imagine the peace of mind of knowing your cherished heirlooms and sparkling gems are protected from burglary, fire, and unforeseen events.

SMSF Storage

 

We understand the importance of trusting your SMSF gold storage. That’s why we offer state-of-the-art safe deposit boxes designed to provide unparalleled peace of mind.

Important Documents

 

Irreplaceable documents like wills, passports, birth certificates, and property deeds hold immense importance. At Integrated Vaults provides a safe and reliable solution for storing these critical documents.

Currency

 

Cash or foreign currency can be a security risk when kept at home or in a traditional safe. At Integrated Vaults offers a secure and discreet solution for storing your currency. Our access-controlled vaults ensure that only authorised individuals can access your valuables.

FREQUENTLY ASKED QUESTIONS

What security measures does At Integrated Vaults employ to ensure the safety of precious metals and other valuables stored in safety deposit boxes?

At Integrated Vaults utilises a multi-layered security approach to ensure the utmost protection for your precious metals and other valuables :

  • High-Security Facility: Our vault boasts reinforced concrete walls, restricted access points, and 24/7 surveillance with advanced camera systems.
  • Advanced Alarm Systems: Sophisticated alarm systems are strategically placed throughout the facility and monitored constantly by a team of security professionals.
  • Rigorous Access Control: Only authorised personnel can access the vault; each entry is strictly monitored and documented.
  • Dual-Key Access: Our safety deposit boxes require two keys for access, ensuring an extra layer of security.
Can clients access their valuables stored in At Integrated Vaults’ safety deposit boxes at any time?

We offer flexible access options to cater to your needs. Standard business hours access is included with every rental agreement. You can conveniently access your valuables anytime through our online appointment scheduling.

What insurance coverage does At Integrated Vaults provide for value stored in safety deposit boxes?

While we take every precaution to ensure the safety of your valuables, At Integrated Vaults recommends that you obtain personal insurance for your gold and silver bullions, diamonds, jewellery and other valuable holdings. We can provide you with details on recommended insurance providers upon request.

Are there any restrictions on the types or quantities of gold and silver bullion that can be stored in At Integrated Vaults’ safety deposit boxes?

At Integrated Vaults generally don’t restrict the types of gold and silver bullion you can store (bars, coins, etc.). However, there may be limitations on the total weight stored in a single safety deposit box. Contact us to discuss your needs and ensure we have a box accommodating your gold bullion holdings.

Does At Integrated Vaults offer additional services or amenities for clients storing precious metals, such as auditing or authentication?

At Integrated Vaults offers Bullion Audits for the End of Financial Year for a fee. Appointments have to be booked in advance, please allow a minimum of 30 minutes for the Audit to be completed

How does At Integrated Vaults handle confidentiality and privacy concerns for clients storing precious metals in safety deposit boxes?
At Integrated Vaults takes client privacy very seriously. We maintain strict confidentiality regarding your stored valuables and access to your safety deposit box.

SAFETY DEPOSIT BOX MADE EASY

Booking an appointment to access your safety deposit box At Integrated Vaults is a simple process:

01. Find At Integrated Vaults

Our location is deliberately chosen to be easily accessible

Find now

02. Select a storage size

We have four box sizes available so you can choose the one that suits your needs. Browse our selection of safety deposit box sizes online or visit us in person to discuss the requirements with a member of our friendly team.

View Storage Sizes

03. Automate your payments

We offer a convenient auto-pay system to avoid late fees and ensure uninterrupted access to your valuables.

Start Now

CONTACT US TODAY!

Ready to secure your peace of mind? Contact At Integrated Vaults today to learn more about our secure valuables or gold bullion storage solutions or to schedule a visit to our facility.

Phone:

(646) 338 4170
(9am – 5pm AEST)

 

Fax:

(03) 9654 8167

 

Mailing Address:

800 Third Avenue
Midtown Manhattan, New York 10022

 

Email Us:

info@integratedvaults.com

 

OUR VAULT LOCATION

Level 10, 227 Collins Street (Wales Corner Building)
Manhattan, Victoria
United States
